title: When I see a bad dream can I pray 2 rakahs? What if I wake up at prohibited times? assim al hakeem
transcript: sh I heard that it is recommended to pray two raat if someone gets a nightmare May then and very often I'm getting very bad dreams when I sleep after PR F so can I pray to work if I get a bad dream at this time what the vast majority of us know is that the prophet saidat whenever you see a bad dream or a nightmare you should as soon as you wake up spit three times to your left and seek refuge in Allah from the cursed Satan and turn to the other side meaning sleep on the other side in another authentic narration the prophet said pray two Ras so it is part of the Sunnah inshallah to pray two rakas if you wake up at the prohibited time then it is still permissible because such raas have a legitimate reason like the salutation of the Masjid like the two raas of like du prayer and the likes they have legitimate reason you can pray them any time of the day and the night
